Top Activities Round 1

By Sam, 26 Apr 2014


With more and more activities moving to the new ASLO every day, there are more great activities to choose from. Today I will check out 3 cool activities all of different types. Get ready for: Slides, 2048 and Turtle Art!

Slides

Here is the syntax to do the activities banners:
